thread.title: Watch: Stenson turns into shoeless amateur at 11
thread.title_full: Watch: Stenson turns into shoeless amateur at 11

author: nbcsports.com
title: Watch: Stenson turns into shoeless amateur at 11
text:
RSS 
Phil Mickelson hijinks aside, it's not often you see a champion golfer of the year resemble one of your buddies during a Friday afternoon 18. 
But enter Henrik Stenson, the fifth-ranked player in the world who carded a triple bogey-7 at the par-4 11th after removing his spikes, stepping into the water, and having more than a little trouble with the steep bank: And this is the story all about how, Stenson's day got flipped, turned upside down. pic.twitter.com/1duHD5fVEU â€” Golf Channel (@GolfChannel) March 17, 2017 
Which is better: The still-barefoot Stenson putting out with his wedge, or the still-barefoot Stenson casually juggling his ball back into the water? Article Tags: 
Contributions from writers and editors on the Golf Channel Digital team. Editor's Picks
